abstract: Kenyan government says it plans to shut down Dadaab refugee camp and expel hundreds of thousands of Somali refugees there; authorities say camp is being used by terrorists as refuge.

headline.print_headline: Kenya Says It Will Expel Refugees
headline.main: Kenya Plans to Expel Somali Refugees From Dadaab Camp, Citing Terror Threat

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: International aid agencies said shutting down the massive Dadaab refugee camp would violate international law and endanger hundreds of thousands of people.
lead_paragraph: International aid agencies said shutting down the massive Dadaab refugee camp would violate international law and endanger hundreds of thousands of people.
